mapper.insert: insert into recipe(recipe_no, recipe_nick, recipe_title, recipe_info, recipe_time, recipe_hashtag, recipe_difficulty) values(#{recipeNo}, #{recipeNick}, #{recipeTitle}, #{recipeInfo}, #{recipeTime}, #{recipeHashtag} #{recipeDifficulty})
mapper.select: select * from recipe order by recipe_no desc
mapper.update: update recipe set recipe_title = #{recipeTitle}, recipe_info = #{recipeInfo}, recipe_time = #{recipeTime}, recipe_hashtag = #{recipeHashtag}, recipe_difficulty = #{recipeDifficulty}, where recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
mapper.select:
